alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:16PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Butte, central Meade and south central Perkins Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 816 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Mud Butte to 2 miles northeast of Fairpoint to 6 miles northeast of Hereford. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Stoneville around 820 PM MDT. Enning around 835 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Red Owl, Maurine and Opal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northwestern South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains
